pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Aggressive$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Birch Ent Tree.$(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)N/A$().$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() 18-24 $(item)Birch Logs$(), Chance between 1-4 $(item)Birch Leaves$() or 1-4 $(item)Birch Saplings$(), 85%% chance of 1-2 $(item)Diamonds$().

pages.title: Description
pages.text: An ancient like creature made of wood and leaves, The Birch Ent is a massive creature that stands taller than most mobs in the world, as well as bulkier and stronger than most. This creature is not as angry of a ent, but still will absolutely deck the player if it is awakened from itsâ€™ slumber.
